definition: to be ready/to be in order

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
everything in its place and ready (idiom)

sentences.english: So was I. Unlike 1987, this time I was ready.
sentences.chinese: 不同於1987年，這一次，我已經準備就緒。

sentences.english: With the view in place, constructing the source query is a snap.
sentences.chinese: 視圖就緒後，構造數據源查詢就是小事一樁。

sentences.english: We must square away before the examiners arrive.
sentences.chinese: 在主考人員到達之前我們必須準備就緒。

sentences.english: What aspects of your district assembly program are already in place?
sentences.chinese: 你的地區講習會節目有哪些方面已經就緒？

sentences.english: When we were ready, we left on to Mount Tabor to get readyfor the fight.
sentences.chinese: 一切準備就緒之後，我們向他泊山出發。

sentences.english: The infernal gate has been prepared, while the time of our final victory is at hand.
sentences.chinese: 獄火之門已經就緒，最終勝利唾手可得。

sentences.english: By six o'clock the horses were all saddled, the grub wagon ready.
sentences.chinese: 六點鐘，馬都備了鞍，裝糧食的大車也安排就緒。

sentences.english: A well-crafted readiness plan answers the questions itemized earlier.
sentences.chinese: 撰寫很好的準備就緒的計劃回答了先前列舉的問題。

sentences.english: Now that you have the directory structure scaffolded out, the next step is to write the implementation.
sentences.chinese: 現在目錄結構已經就緒，下一步就是編寫實現。

sentences.english: The products are ready and already implemented in magento.
sentences.chinese: 該產品已經準備就緒，已在Magento實施。

sentences.english: Don Juan is already getting ready for it.
sentences.chinese: 唐璜已經爲此準備就緒。

sentences.english: When the breech was closed and all was ready, the gunner yanked the lanyard.
sentences.chinese: 大炮後膛門關上後，一切準備就緒，炮手拉動引火繩。

sentences.english: After the project definition has been prepared, the workplan can be created.
sentences.chinese: 在項目定義準備就緒後就可以建立工作計劃了。
垂直運輸機具準備就緒。

sentences.english: Never be early, as the host may not have everything prepared yet.
sentences.chinese: 千萬不要提早到，因爲主人可能尚未一切就緒。

definition: lit. fight minutes, snatch seconds (idiom); a race against time/making every second count
to equip/to fit out/to get ready (for a journey)/to arrange (clothes) to be ready

lit. military tactics on paper (idiom)/fig. theoretical discussion that is worse than useless in practice/armchair strategist/idle theorizing/cf Zhao Kuo 趙括|赵括 leading an army of 400,000 to total annihilation at battle of Changping 長平之戰|长平之战 in 260 BC
lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
to bury oneself in work (idiom); to be engrossed in work/to make an all-out effort/up to the neck in work
first draft/to draw up (a first version)
Wanquan county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
